reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 174/97: RESTRUCTURING COMMISSION FOR THE SIOUX LOOKOUT PLANNING AREA
reg_info.reg_name_text: RESTRUCTURING COMMISSION FOR THE SIOUX LOOKOUT PLANNING AREA
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. A commission is established to develop a restructuring proposal for the locality comprised of the geographic area of the Sioux Lookout Planning Area described in the Schedule and consisting of the Town of Sioux Lookout and the geographic Townships of Drayton, Jordan, Vermilion and Vermilion Additional and Grand Trunk Pacific Block 10 in the Territorial District of Kenora. O. Reg. 174/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A commission is established to develop a restructuring proposal for the locality comprised of the geographic area of the Sioux Lookout Planning Area described in the Schedule and consisting of the Town of Sioux Lookout and the geographic Townships of Drayton, Jordan, Vermilion and Vermilion Additional and Grand Trunk Pacific Block 10 in the Territorial District of Kenora. O. Reg. 174/97, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The Commission shall be composed of one member to be appointed by the Minister. O. Reg. 174/97, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The Commission shall be composed of one member to be appointed by the Minister. O. Reg. 174/97, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) The following are the types of restructuring that may be included in the restructuring proposal to be developed by the Commission: 1. Annexing unorganized territory to a municipality. 2. Dissolving all or part of a local municipality. 3. Incorporating a local municipality. (2) Subsection (1) does not include a restructuring that results in, (a) an increase in the number of municipalities; (b) territory becoming unorganized territory; (c) unorganized territory becoming part of a municipality that is incorporated under paragraph 3 of subsection 3 (1). (3) Subsection (1) does not include a restructuring of a municipality outside the locality described in section 1. O. Reg. 174/97, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. (1) The following are the types of restructuring that may be included in the restructuring proposal to be developed by the Commission:

1. Annexing unorganized territory to a municipality.

2. Dissolving all or part of a local municipality.

3. Incorporating a local municipality.

(2) Subsection (1) does not include a restructuring that results in,

(a) an increase in the number of municipalities;

(b) territory becoming unorganized territory;

(c) unorganized territory becoming part of a municipality that is incorporated under paragraph 3 of subsection 3 (1).

(3) Subsection (1) does not include a restructuring of a municipality outside the locality described in section 1. O. Reg. 174/97, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The Commission is authorized to determine its costs and may charge these costs to the Town of Sioux Lookout.
